docs.snippet: LAKE SUCCESS, March 26-- The Board of Directors of the International League for the Rights of Man released today a resolution "condemning" measures taken by the Argentine authorities against the independent newspaper La Prensa of Buenos Aires.

docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, March 27--Secretary of State Dean Acheson rallied the American republics today to the "partnership of the free world" against what he called the greatest menace this hemisphere has ever faced--the "mortal threat" of Soviet communism. He...
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, March 27--Secretary of State Dean Acheson rallied the American republics today to the "partnership of the free world" against what he called the greatest menace this hemisphere has ever faced--the "mortal threat" of Soviet communism. He asked for action "now."
docs.abstract: Sec Acheson acknowledges effect of US mobilization on Latin Amer; recognizes inflation problem; stresses need for better living conditions; US offers resolution

headline.main: ACHESON EXHORTS AMERICAS TO MEET SOVIET PERIL 'NOW'; 21 Republics Rallied Into Free World Partnership to Ward Off a 'Mortal Threat' SECURITY MOVES PRESSED 4 Nations Submit Resolution on Internal Safety--Fairer Economic Sharing a Goal Acheson Exhorts Americas to Meet Peril Spiritual Federation Outlined Stronger Democracy Urged

docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, March 28--The United States and six Latin nations moved today to strengthen the armed forces of the Western Hemisphere with a view to collective defense both regionally under the treaty of Rio de Janeiro and within the larger scope of...
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, March 28--The United States and six Latin nations moved today to strengthen the armed forces of the Western Hemisphere with a view to collective defense both regionally under the treaty of Rio de Janeiro and within the larger scope of United Nations security efforts.
